subtitle: A delicious accompaniment to grilled or fried pork or beef.

method.text: Heat <sup>2</sup>/<sub>3</sub> of the oil in a frying pan. Saute the potato slices for 5 min until crispy. Remove with a slotted spoon. Place in a warmed serving dish.
Add the mushrooms and salad onions. Fry until softened. Remoe from the pan. Carefully mix in with the potato slices.

Wipe out the frying pan with a piece of kitchen papper. Add remaining oil When quite hot, pour in the cream. Bring to the boil, stirring continuously until sauce thickens and reduces to a coating consistency. Stir in the lemon juice and seasoning.
Pour the sauce over the potato and mushroom mixture. Scatter over the roasted hazelnuts. Garnish with a sprinkling of chives.

title: Saute potatoes and mushrooms with hazelnut sauce
